title: Haley remains defiant as Trump ratchets up attacks on last-standing 2024 GOP rival
description: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley is growing more defiant in the face of Donald Trump’s efforts to push her out of the 2024 Republican primary race, poking and prodding at the former president and encouraging supporters to wear Trump’s attacks as a badge of honor.

title: Iowa secretary of state introduces bill that could limit 14th Amendment ballot challenges against Trump
description: Iowa Secretary of State Paul Pate introduced a bill that could limit challenges to former President Trump being on the ballot under the 14th Amendment.

title: Trump cites allegations of improper relationship in effort to dismiss Georgia election charges
description: A Trump co-defendant in the election interference case alleged this month that two key prosecutors in the case were engaged in a romantic relationship.

description: Defeated presidential candidate says his Citizens Coalition for Change party has been ‘contaminated’ by ruling Zanu-PF

title: Congressional talks on US-Mexico border and Ukraine aid near collapse
description: Amid warnings soldiers may run out of ammunition, Senate minority leader Mitch McConnell said to abandon compromise

title: Reform UK support surges to record high
description: Reform UK is more popular than at any point in its history, according to opinion polling, which shows 13 per cent of Britons would vote for the party if the general election was held now.

title: Michigan GOP chair Kristina Karamo rightly ousted, say RNC lawyers
description: Swing state’s Republican party has seen two feuding groups claiming to be its legitimate leaders in recent weeks

title: PETER HITCHENS: I've witnessed two executions and I've no problem with Kenneth Smith being put to death in Alabama - although hanging would be swifter and more humane
description: In modern Britain your view on the death penalty is a test of whether you are a good person. I am therefore a bad person. Hundreds of right-thinking people think I'm a monster.

title: Deputies reject rolling elections idea
description: The proposal for an investigation was submitted by Deputies Peter Roffey and the President of the States Assembly and Constitution Committee, Carl Meerveld. Mr Roffey said he suggested the idea because "the majority of the assembly have concerns about this".

title: PM insists he is ‘making progress’ despite Tory warnings of electoral ‘massacre’
description: Rishi Sunak has told Conservatives fearing they face being electorally “massacred” that he is “making progress”, as he urged them to stick with his plan. Former Cabinet minister Sir Simon Clarke’s warning that the Tories face oblivion at the next election without a change in the Prime Minister was followed by fresh gloom from an adviser.

title: Trump leads Biden by SIX POINTS: New nationwide poll shows huge surge for ex-president - but 25% of voters are still undecided and 65% don't want the rematch at all
description: Trump leads President Joe Biden by 40 to 34 in a new Reuters/Ipsos poll, which comes after both men prevailed in separate New Hampshire primaries. The balance are unsure or back someone else.

title: Iowa and New Hampshire showcased Trump’s strengths – and exposed his weaknesses
description: The first two Republican presidential nominating contests have validated what has been apparent for nearly eight years: Donald Trump remains a singular, dominant force within his party.

title: Labour holds huge 34-point lead in key marginal seats, YouGov poll finds
description: Labour holds a mammoth lead over the Tories in the key marginals it needs to win a majority at the general election, a new YouGov poll has found. Sir Keir Starmer ’s party is an incredible 34 points ahead of Rishi Sunak ’s party in 150 crucial target constituencies.

title: UUP: Iraq veteran Col Tim Collins to run in North Down
description: Retired British Army colonel Tim Collins is to run for the Ulster Unionists as their North Down candidate in the next general election. Col Collins is best known for his role in the Iraq War in 2003. The last time an MP from the party was elected to North Down was 2010.

title: Despite likely presidential election rematch, Lake County political leaders focused on local races; ‘We’re excited to take on the challenge’
description: Lake County Democratic and Republican officials are gearing up for the 2024 election — and two national conventions in the region. A general election rematch between President Joe Biden and former President Donald Trump is looking more likely after Trump secured more votes in New Hampshire than his Republican opponent Nikki Haley.

title: The Biden Campaign Must Be About More Than Trump
description: If President Biden believes that Trump truly represents an existential threat to democracy, it is incumbent on him to articulate a campaign, and governing strategy, that is similarly exceptional. title: UK Treasury Warns Ministers Money for Giveaways May Be Limited

title: OUTLOOK 2024 Central Europe

title: Hundreds of fines issued to Darlington parents for school absences
description: The number of fines issued to parents for children missing school in Darlington has increased sharply. In 2022/23, it increased by 24 per cent to 932.
